greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,m) read by rows: product A127093 * A127094.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: A127093 := proc(n,m) if m> n or m<1 or n < 1 then 0 ; elif (n mod m) = 0 then m; else 0 ; fi; end:
for n from 1 to 30 do for m from 1 to n do printf("%d,",A127098(n,m)) ; od: od: # _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 02 2009
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 05 2007
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 02 2009
